resources.string:
By Jianwei Wang 

The app is getting data from one of the NASA open APIs - Mars Rover Photos to show the latest mars photos and the related info, e.g. rover, camera and taken date. 
1. Users can select linear layout to show bigger photos in the list or select grid layout to see more smaller photos. 
2. Users can also select which rover or rovers they like to see the photos of by toggling the rovers selection button. 
3. By clicking any of the photos, users can view the very photo in a dedicated page with related info to that photo.
Photo taken by Curiocity on sol 1000
